news_header: Pope Francis hospitalized with respiratory infection, affecting upcoming Vatican events.
news_original_title: Vatican cancels papal audiences and Holy Year events as Pope Francis remains hospitalized
news_text: Pope Francis, 88, remains hospitalized due to a polymicrobial respiratory infection, leading to the cancellation of papal audiences and uncertainty regarding upcoming Holy Year events in 2025. His condition is serious, with concerns about pneumonia, although he has shown some stability.
